attributes.action: Period products to be free across the whole of england!
attributes.additional_details: Girls didn’t ask to get periods so why should they have to pay for pads or tampons?
attributes.background: Period products should be free as periods are a thing that every girl has, not every woman can afford them, like homeless people for example.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Fund free female sanitary products, such as sanitary towels and tampons
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555551
